name: listSome
syntax: listSome(list, closure [, delimiter] [, includeEmptyFields] [, multiCharacterDelimiter] [, parallel] [, maxThreads])
member: list.listSome(closure [, delimiter] [, includeEmptyFields] [, multiCharacterDelimiter] [, parallel] [, maxThreads])
description: This function calls a given closure/function with every element in a given string list and returns true, if one of the closure calls returns true.

params.name: list
params.description:
string list to iterate

Alias: string

params.name: closure
params.description:
function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(any value, numeric index,string list, string delimiter):boolean].

Alias: function, callback, udf

callback_params.name: delimiter
callback_params.description: delimiter used to separate the string list

params.name: delimiter
params.description: delimiter used to separate the string list

params.name: multiCharacterDelimiter
params.description: specifying whether the delimiters parameter specifies a multi-character delimiter. If this parameter is true, the delimiters parameter must specify a single delimiter consisting of multiple characters. This parameter enables the ListToArray function to convert a list to an array of color names

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: maximum number of threads executed, ignored when argument "parallel" is set to false

links.title: Map, Reduce and other Higher Order Functions
links.description: A Primer for map, reduce, filter, and Higher Order Functions in general.

examples.title: List contains some.
examples.description: Take a string list and see if some elements match a given predicate.
